title: LRD v6.3: Universal Fractal Attractor — A Unified Theory of Scale-Invariant Dynamics from Neural Correlations to Cosmic Structure
description:
Universal Fractal Attractor Theory

We present evidence for a Universal Fractal Attractor (UFA) at fractal dimension D ≈ 1.3 (Hurst exponent H ≈ 0.65) emerging across vastly different systems:

  • Geological formations and pareidolia perception
  • Neural long-range dependence (EEG/LFP)
  • Financial market microstructure (square-root law)
  • Cosmic microwave background fluctuations
  • Physiological time series (HRV, gait)

Key Contributions:

  • Resonance Perception Theorem: P_rec ∝ exp(-(D_ext - D*)²/2σ²)
  • Mathematical derivation of the Mandelbrot bridge D = 2 - H
  • Information-theoretic foundation for the attractor
  • Cross-domain empirical validation
  • Resonance Index calculator for practical applications

This synthesis suggests that D ≈ 1.3 represents a fundamental optimization principle governing complex adaptive systems.
